scripts.register:device: sh -c 'BASE=${BASE:-http://localhost:3000}; COOKIES=${COOKIES:-cookie.txt}; PLATFORM=${PLATFORM:-ios}; TOKEN=${DEVICE_TOKEN:?Set DEVICE_TOKEN}; curl -b $COOKIES -X POST "$BASE/push/register" -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d "{\"platform\":\"$PLATFORM\",\"deviceToken\":\"$TOKEN\"}"'
scripts.publish:course:students: sh -c 'BASE=${BASE:-http://localhost:3000}; COOKIES=${COOKIES:-cookie.txt}; COURSE=${COURSE_ID:-MATH101}; curl -b $COOKIES -X POST "$BASE/publish/course" -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d "{\"courseId\":\"$COURSE\",\"audience\":\"students\",\"type\":\"notification\",\"payload\":{\"title\":\"Welcome\",\"body\":\"See syllabus\",\"sound\":\"default\",\"badge\":1,\"link\":\"app://course/$COURSE\"}}"'
scripts.publish:course:guardians:attendance: sh -c 'BASE=${BASE:-http://localhost:3000}; COOKIES=${COOKIES:-cookie.txt}; COURSE=${COURSE_ID:-MATH101}; curl -b $COOKIES -X POST "$BASE/publish/course" -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d "{\"courseId\":\"$COURSE\",\"audience\":\"guardians\",\"type\":\"attendance\",\"payload\":{\"title\":\"Attendance\",\"body\":\"Attendance update posted\",\"sound\":\"default\",\"link\":\"app://attendance/$COURSE\"}}"'
scripts.publish:role:guardians: sh -c 'BASE=${BASE:-http://localhost:3000}; COOKIES=${COOKIES:-cookie.txt}; curl -b $COOKIES -X POST "$BASE/publish/role" -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d "{\"role\":\"guardian\",\"payload\":{\"title\":\"School Update\",\"body\":\"Early dismissal today\",\"sound\":\"default\"}}"'
